metadata.name: Still Standing
metadata.description:
$1 OPEN MINT | Those who own 10 pieces will receive a free airdrop!

This highly limit3d piece is my first open edition, here to bring wonderful art to you for an incredibly low price of only $1!

“A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.”  
- Nelson Mandela

“Rayons de Lumière” is French for “Rays of Light”. Crypto and NFT’s may have one of the worst years ever, but one who never gives up, and sees the light during even the darkest of times, will eventually turn out a winner. If you are here right now, that means that you are still standing, and you will soon be a winner! 

Thank you so much for being here with me on this incredible Web3 journey! 

I appreciate you.  
Vinc3nt
